message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC 

This paper is about a method for proactive information retrieval, which involves predicting the user's needs and providing relevant information before the user explicitly searches for it. This topic is closely related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL), as well as machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques used to make predictions. Additionally, the focus on writing tasks suggests a potential connection to human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
